post.body: an who wants to work on new years? cuz i'm fine with it.
bud ice = maximum impact, minimum cash flow
soy sauce packets & mp3s - http://tinyurl.com/9gfz6w
thank you for calling we'reabunchofdouchebags.com, how can i fcuk up your day? (that's how i should be answering the phone.)
sitting in traffic on i-95 is the GREATEST cure for writers block. and for once in my life, i'm not being sracastic.
i just brewed some coffee in the french press, and i'm listening to charles and eddie...
how quickly i forgot how awesome it is to not have to wake up for anything...
i'm such a pussy, i'm going to bed.
about those raspberry flavored peaches that i was so excited about... apparently no one else thought they were delish...
take 30 seconds, click this link, and vote for kiva. it's free. 30 seconds, i promise. and i'll owe you one. thx. http://tinyurl.com/8b4sb2
i'm not sure who decided it'd be a good idea to add raspberry flavor to a can of peaches, but i'm pretty excited about it...
beep beep. i'm goin' to mother f'n sleep.
in case you were wondering, asians LOVE rockefeller center on christmas. LOVE.
letter from the i-95 corridor: http://tinyurl.com/8cgavj
Nekkid Santa & Mrs. C. http://tinyurl.com/8hxsnk
TIME TO TAKE AN ELF NAP.
i made it to sloppy snowland and i didn't even have to call the crisis hotline number from the electronic sign on the deleware mem. bridge.
i'm about to skid out.
when i was 5 i remember christmas eve being the longest night of my life waiting for santa. now it's cause i can't wait to get off of work.
it's gonna be a loooooong night of driving...
